name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruction.stripedread.timeout.millis
description: Datanode striped read timeout in milliseconds.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.max-lifetime
description:
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds for which a delegation 
      token is valid.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.size
description:
Total size in bytes of Datanode blocks to get when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period
description:
The number of seconds between two periodic checkpoints.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.
